thread.title: Pence visits vandalized Jewish cemetery: ‘There is no place in America for hatred’
thread.title_full: Pence visits vandalized Jewish cemetery: ‘There is no place in America for hatred’

author: John Wagner
title: Pence visits vandalized Jewish cemetery: ‘There is no place in America for hatred’
text: Pence visits vandalized Jewish cemetery: ‘There is no place in America for hatred’   Vice President Pence on Feb. 22 visited a Jewish cemetery in University City, Mo., where headstones had been toppled. “There is no place in America for hatred,” Pence said. ( ) RELATED LINKS - Vice President Pence on Feb. 22 visited a Jewish cemetery in University City, Mo., where headstones had been toppled. “There is no place in America for hatred,” Pence said.
